= Introduction =

The project *DecoJer* currently exists of 3 sub projects.
  * DecoJer
  * DecoJerTest
  * DecoJerWeb

They are separately checked in (*Subversion*) and preconfigured for the *Eclipse* IDE.

= Details =

Install Plugins:
  * Install *Subversive*:
    * Choose Update Manager: Indigo - http://download.eclipse.org/releases/indigo
    * select Collaboration / Subversive SVN...
    * after Installation and Eclipse Restart should appear the Subversive Connector Installer: Choose e.g. Native JavaHL 1.6

Checkout:

Add Subversion Repository Location (https://decojer.googlecode.com/svn/):
http://decojer.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/img/eclipse_svn_repository_location.png

  * Install *Google Plugin for Eclipse*:
    * Add Update Manager: http://dl.google.com/eclipse/plugin/3.7
    * select all items
    * (see under http://code.google.com/intl/de-DE/eclipse/docs/download.html)

  * Web, XML, Java EE and OSGi Enterprise Development
    * Eclipse Java Web Developer Tools
    * Eclipse Web Developer Tools
    * JavaScript Development Tools
